I.O.I

Introduction

Sohye was a member of the girl group I.O.I after placing 5th on Produce 101. She is currently an actress.

Sohye debuted as a member of I.O.I on May 4, 2016 with the EP "Chrysalis". The group disbanded on January 31, 2017.

In June 2016, she created S&P (Shark & Penguin) Entertainment to manage her activities as an idol.

In 2017, Sohye made her acting debut in the web drama Poetry Story
